meanings: just[immediately, right] before, just prior to
be on the point[verge, brink] of bankruptcy
토픽 The company is going into bankruptcy.
토픽 Our company is about to crash.

meanings.meaning: on/to the verge of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: 지금 배데렐라 기절 직전이에요 기절 직전! BAE-derella is about to pass out. Just about to! 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🌏 보고싶어서 왔클! 4인실 + 2인실 🌏
vlive.english: BAE-derella is about to pass out. Just about to!

vlive.korean: [질문] 여기 오기 직전에 한 일은? [Q] What did you do right before this interview? 듣기 View video OSEN : '스타로드' 에이핑크 오하영, 50문50답 스타트! #EP 03
vlive.english: [Q] What did you do right before this interview?

vlive.korean: [제한 시간 종료 직전] [노랑팀 한준 정답] 잘했어요! [Yellow team HAN JUN got it right] Great job! 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [4회] '이판 사판 난장판' 어푸어푸 암산 왕 대결 현장
vlive.english: [Yellow team HAN JUN got it right] Great job!
